message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  $140 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $105. What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $125, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $130 is still a bit high for me. Let's split the difference and go with $120.
I see you're getting close to my minimum price, Bob! I can meet you halfway between $120 and $130, so I'm willing to go to $127.50. What do you think?
